document_data.name: Hsi Yog
document_data.mainbody: '''Hsi Yog''' was a [[Tuigan]] [[Shukenja|shugenja]] and member of the [[Grand Army of the Tuigan]] during the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Hsi used his clerical powers to aid the soldiers of the army under Prince [[Hubadai Khahan]]'s command.
document_data.Abilities: The following spells were available to Hsi: ''[[deflection]]'', ''[[cure light wounds]]'', ''[[snake charm]]'', ''[[hold person]]'', ''[[levitate]]'', ''[[snake barrier]]'', ''[[detect lie]]'', and ''[[possess]]''.
document_data.Possessions: Hsi owned a pair of ''[[bracers of defense]]'' and a magical [[tetsubo]].
